name: Miso Ramen
description: Ramen cooked with miso broth, fresh vegetables, Bok Choy, Chashu Pork, Nitamago(Egg)

name: Shio Ramen
description: Delicated and light flavour of Shio, top with variety of vegetables and Chashu Pork

name: Spicy Chicken Ramen
description: Rich and spicy broth, top with tender pieces of seasonsed chicken and vegetables

name: Spicy Tonkotsu Ramen
description: Classic, Tonkotsu Ramen cooked with pork bone with Chashu Pork and vegetables

name: Wonton Chicken Ramen
description: Chicken broth with delicate chicken-filled winton, topped with vegetables mushrooms

name: Salmon
description: Fresh salmon with soysauce fused with Jalapeno

name: Steamed Buns
description: Soft, fluffy steamed buns filled with tender pork cooked with soy sauce

name: Takoyaki
description: Golden and bite-sized balls filled with tender pieces of octopus
